welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beech Grove, a charming city known for its friendly residents and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore our quaint shops, delicious restaurants, and vibrant community. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our lovely city!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Indianapolis International Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as Delta, American, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Indianapolis International Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as Southwest, Frontier, and Allegiant.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mount Comfort Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mount Comfort Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
